com.lockheed.database
Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.lockheed.database.DatabaseConnection
public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object

DatabaseConnection - Connects the top-level interface to the lower level database. This class is necessary for the interchangeability to database systems. Contains all methods to connect and disconnect from the database. Also contains methods which return Java data objects from the SQL database.
